| Overview               = The''' Office of Strategic Services''' O.S.S.{{r|Invaders Now! #2}} was a wartime intelligence agency of the [[United States]] during [[World War II]], and a predecessor to the [[Central Intelligence Agency (Earth-616)|Central Intelligence Agency]] (CIA). 

| History                 = The OSS recognized [[Nicholas Fury (Earth-616)|Nick Fury]]'s potential during the war, using him for a few missions into German-occupied France, and based on this he was officially recruited by [[Thomas Lynaugh (Earth-616)|Colonel Tom Lynaugh]] in 1954. He later trained as an agent for the CIA, serving through until he became a [[Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division (Earth-616)|S.H.I.E.L.D.]] agent.{{r|Nick Fury, Agent of S.H.I.E.L.D. Vol 3 38}}
